rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey... You heard about
Kisra on Emi Island?

rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Apparently they've got a bit
of a Dringworm problem there.

rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Listen up! Dringworms are those nasty
shelled beasties that feed on Divine
Beasts. Thought everybody knew that...

rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0005
rows.name:
Few hundred years back, they
filled an island with holes and
it sank into the Cloud Sea!

rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0006
rows.name:
They need clearing out sharpish,
but doubt there's anybody in
Liberalitas who's capable...

rows.label: tlk47300161_04_msg0008
rows.name:
Great! This mission's a tough one,
so don't take any chances, okay?
